chunks.chunk_text: Hello you guys歡迎每週三來到Fifteen Minutes Cafe 英語咖啡館喝一杯老師們的本週主題特調一起探討國際文化、時事、職涯、網路和音樂等多元主題輕鬆吸收主題相關的詞彙、慣用語和常用例句

chunks.chunk_text: I am currently in Taiwan and just came back from Melbourne.Welcome home.Thank you.Nice to be back home.Again you are flying the Aussie route.Aussie route.Remember last time I mentioned I went to Australia and get COVID there.Yes.This is the same hotel.I hope they sanitize the hotel this time around.They should have.So I'm still alive, still survive.Good.

chunks.chunk_text: I'm back in one piece.Congratulations.And why did I say congratulations?You recently received a promotion.Yay.Thank you.So what exactly is your title right now?It's called Purser.Flight Purser.What is a flight Purser?Used to be a cabin crew.Cabin crew means that you need to work in the cabin on the aisle.So now I'm a Purser.So majority I will be staying in the galley.How do you spell Purser?P-U-R-S-E-R.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.230_ 到頭來我們其實好像不是很有禮貌的乘客 Angel explains what it means to be a good.json

chunks.chunk_text: It's such a word.Purser.The person who carries the purse.Purser.Oh yeah.Right?It sounds like the person who carries the purse.Purser.Purser.I think that's the term for the airline aviation.Like someone in charge something.Purser.Give us a quick one before we start today's conversation.So give us a quick one.Now you are a Purser and it's supposedly a promotion and you say you work in the galley right now.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.230_ 到頭來我們其實好像不是很有禮貌的乘客 Angel explains what it means to be a good.json

chunks.chunk_text: If you work in the galley then you're like a chef.I'm like basically a chef.Yes.I'm a chef.So you used to be the waiter.Now you're the chef.Yeah.A huge leap right?Isn't that a huge leap for the promotion?Right.So you don't need to talk to any passenger.I still have to.If my waitress didn't serve the customer well I still need to go apologize.Yeah.What?So now I am in charge of the galley as well as the cabin.So if the cabin crew who did not
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.230_ 到頭來我們其實好像不是很有禮貌的乘客 Angel explains what it means to be a good.json

chunks.chunk_text: meet the standards or the customer complaint I am the one who is responsible for all the you know.This junior cabin crew missed something and somebody got a complaint and you know give you a stinking face.You're the one who takes care of that right now.Yes.And I'm the one who is going to write the report and report back to the company.So record keeping is part of the job.Right.And then also client complaint is part of the job.And then what else?Cooking.

chunks.chunk_text: Cooking things.Coffee.Tea.That's not your job anymore.I still need to do.What?Doesn't sound like a promotion.It's like extra work.Just extra work.Same thing.Extra work.It's just you don't have to push the trolley around.You know in some aircraft I still have to go.What?Yeah.I thought I didn't have to but because of the COVID we have cut down lots of manpower.Oh.Labor shortage.Before COVID maybe

chunks.chunk_text: the older person don't need to go out but now some of the fly I still need to go out with the cabin crew for the service for the drinks for the food.Yeah.That sucks.But yeah.That was the con and the day to day.Right.What about the perks?They must be perks.Right.For being a purser.You get to shout at the cabin crew.That's not a perk.Why do you want your blood pressure so high?

chunks.chunk_text: I have to relieve my tension you know.So stressful every day.Of course a little bit of the pay raise.Other than pay raise.Nicer uniform.Oh.The uniform is now it's a black skirt so make me look slimmer.Which is also nice.OK.Black skirt.So it's like Starbucks right?Starbucks baristas you know you get the black apron and they're supposedly the professional baristas right?Yeah.OK.Got it.So you're the professional barista.

chunks.chunk_text: In the air.Right.And then you have the right to say something.Because before when I was a cabin crew I only follow the task.I only follow what the pursers or the senior told me to do.But now I get to give advice and then I set up the plan on how we go just go for the service and yeah.OK.We can make the plan.That sounds like a whole lot of fun.So like pre-flight planning you get to get involved in that.Right.

chunks.chunk_text: True.Wow.Alright.That sounds like a mouthful.Alright.So anyways.So coming back to today's topic.Okay.Congratulations on your promotion.Thank you.Because now since you're senior.I think you can.You are in a better position to comment.Of the following.I mean not that you didn't have.You were not in a position to comment.But I mean now that you're senior.You can sort of see it with a bird's eye view.The manager's view.And on the ground.

chunks.chunk_text: You say manager and then in the air it's a purser.Purser.Alright.So what is beyond a purser before we start.You mean as in.Yeah.What's next.Next.After a purser.Senior purser.I'm not kidding.It's really called senior purser.And then there is a uniform change.Okay.So the first level purser is a single purser and the next purser is a double purser.Yeah.Yeah.Yeah.

chunks.chunk_text: you know you being a senior person and you know like how you shout at the junior purser and the junior purser shouts at the cabin crew and the cabin crew gives a stinking face to the guy sitting there at the back.Right.So today I got one for you.I saw this article and I have to ask.This is the do's and don'ts in flat.Oh.Do's and don'ts.And actually well technically if I translated this article I saw it from the internet.

chunks.chunk_text: The Taiwan news media.And they're talking about the big no no.The nine big no no's.When you take a plane.Okay.The big no no's.So I'm gonna rephrase it and say you know the do's and the don'ts.Okay.Okay.Because when it's big no no that means don't do it.Don't do it.I'm curious as to how big of a no no this is.Okay.Because to me I'm a passenger.I'm a customer.And sometimes I do this.What did you do.You know when I read the big no no's and then I'm like.

chunks.chunk_text: Yeah.But sometimes you know as passengers we don't know it's a big no no.Oh.Okay.Right.We don't know it's a big no no.It's not part of the inflight manual.It's not part of the security video.Right.It's none of that.So I don't know it's a big no no.So I don't I'm not so sure if we can fault the passengers for this.So the first one as passengers get hungry when we smell the galley cooking something you smell it and we get hungry and we see people walking behind the curtain.

chunks.chunk_text: Right.And you hear sometimes you hear the cabin crew chatting and then what happens to us passengers is we're like stop chatting and do your job serve the food.We're hungry right now.Oh.And then especially kids when we were young you know I would badger my mom and say you know I smell food and waste food.So my mom would press the button and call for service.The call bell.Yes.Use the call bell call for service.

chunks.chunk_text: And the cabin crew will come and apparently this is a big no no to rush and push for food.Yes.This is a big big no no.Okay.But kids are hungry.Kids are hungry.So why didn't you bring any food with you like snakes or something.And then because kids meal if you have order the kids meal for the kids.Yes.We will deliver the kids meal right after take off.So this is the kids meal issue.Right.You must indicate kids meal.Okay.

chunks.chunk_text: why you're chatting.We're not chatting even though we're chatting but we're still doing something.We're preparing the card preparing the drinks and preparing the bread and the cloth everything.So we're not basically we don't have time to just sit there and doing nothing.So how fast does it take to heat the bread.The bread takes 10 minutes.Okay.So the bread is always ready first and then the main course usually takes 20 to 25 minutes.Right.And then the card whenever you saw the card

chunks.chunk_text: like chit chatting.Right.From behind the curtains.And then we're guessing like seriously what the hell are you guys doing.That's why most of us under the wrong impression.Right.I smell the food ready.Like why are you not serving.I have to say cabin crew are the one who want to go for the service.I think they want to finish the service as soon as possible so that they can start for their rest period.Right.So none of the cabin crew will delay the service I'm sure because they want to go to sleep.Come on.We got the idea already.

chunks.chunk_text: You're wrong.Right.Because it's the cabin crew who wants to rush the service and get it over and done with.Right.Thank you for filling that gap.Now I know.Thank you for asking.Yes.Rushing your meal orders.Pick no no because no point in doing that.No point in doing that.Even though you rush.The meal's still in the oven.It's still cold.Unless you want cold main course.Yeah.We can give you that on ground whenever you want.Now just to sidetrack a little bit OK OK if I

chunks.chunk_text: 我不能急著吃飯,我還可以急著點飲料,我還可以點飲料呢?你還可以點飲料,是,但是因為之前的服務,所有的攤位都很忙,他們有很多工作要完成所以如果你急著點飲料,可能你還是要等,因為我們沒有手機,沒有超級的男主角去幫你點飲料如果只是橙汁,當然可以,很方便,可以給你但是如果是一杯雞尾酒,你可能需要等一會
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.230_ 到頭來我們其實好像不是很有禮貌的乘客 Angel explains what it means to be a good.json

chunks.chunk_text: 所以一個簡單的例子就是,所有的攤位都在攤位,所以沒有特別的男主角去幫你點飲料所以你必須專注在主要的事情,就是點飲料,準備食物,讓服務人員可以按照常規進行,然後人們可以幫你點飲料然後記得我們有寶寶在船上,是嗎?我不知道,誰是寶寶?你的寶寶!
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.230_ 到頭來我們其實好像不是很有禮貌的乘客 Angel explains what it means to be a good.json

chunks.chunk_text: 有很多,有很多寶寶,尤其是夏天,有百萬的寶寶在船上,所以說有寶寶在船上,所以第一件事,我們需要先安排寶寶的座椅,這樣就能提升一個男主角的能力,所以更加快,更加忙碌
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.230_ 到頭來我們其實好像不是很有禮貌的乘客 Angel explains what it means to be a good.json

chunks.chunk_text: 我的哥哥坐在我媽媽的座椅上,所以我們坐在三層座椅上,然後我們吃完飯後,我媽媽經常是一個很好的人,然後她把桌子放在桌子上哦,把桌子放在桌子上,看起來這是一個很大的不,不,我不記得看到Kavan Crew的臉,但是,根據這篇文章,是一個很大的不,不,為什麼是一個很大的不,不,我們要很好的,我們會把東西給你,很好的
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.230_ 到頭來我們其實好像不是很有禮貌的乘客 Angel explains what it means to be a good.json

chunks.chunk_text: 它不快速,我還需要把桌子放在我的手上,然後我會給你拿回去,對,桌子放在手上,然後在空氣上,對,像在搖晃,他們在搖晃我,用他們的桌子,像,嘿,看我,看我,好,那有多大的不,不,是怎樣的?我覺得是合理的,如果你可以保持你等的時間,所以就算了,訓練你的肌肉,對,訓練肌肉,像做起步,因為它不太會幫助,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.230_ 到頭來我們其實好像不是很有禮貌的乘客 Angel explains what it means to be a good.json

chunks.chunk_text: 那你可以慢慢的極速地在桌子上,所以不用多人來收集,不用把桌子放在空氣上,沒這個問題,隨便做一件事,只是把它放在桌子上,這就行了。就是把它放在桌子上,然後就好,嗯,嗯,就像它的流程一樣,大家有很好的意識,他們想幫忙,但有時候他們太幫忙,還是不必要的,那,那,那,那結果就不好,我看到一個家庭,他們把有十個桌子放在一起,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.230_ 到頭來我們其實好像不是很有禮貌的乘客 Angel explains what it means to be a good.json

chunks.chunk_text: 多麼的好家族,他們可以帶你回Gatley,謝謝我真的不知道要怎麼做,但我還是...但如果你是航班隊員,你會對客人說什麼呢?你會給客人一個長臉嗎?當然不會!當然不會,對吧?對,但我意思是,再一次,很多人還不懂得知道,你通過一個航班就可能會更快
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.230_ 到頭來我們其實好像不是很有禮貌的乘客 Angel explains what it means to be a good.json

chunks.chunk_text: 一人一人,而不是把他們放在一群上,然後把他們交給其他人,所以這是一個很大的不,現在我們知道了,一人一人,傳統的,除非我們有一天會有這些無能的東西,例如我們可以吃這個盒子,或者這個盒子。但有一個很有趣的地方是,你記住,當你進食,你會有一個盒子,然後你會有很多警察的桌子在盒子上,對吧?所以有時候,當你收拾東西,它就空了,只剩下盒子了。

chunks.chunk_text: 所以盒子和盒子都空了!你吃完了嗎?你知道嗎?很久以前,我記得,當小孩的時候,盒子是真正的盒子,但今天它們是紙盒,它們比紙盒更糟糕,它們是很糟糕的,真的沒什麼用在把它們帶回家。但還是,它是一個很受歡迎的紀念品。我從來沒有去過商業級或第一級,我可能會想要偷東西,如果我去商業級,

chunks.chunk_text: 那是不感謝的,那盒子是不感謝的。就像是醫院給你的一盒啤酒,所以不感謝。真的嗎?然後你知道那些塑膠袋在飛行嗎?那些是塑膠袋,但其實它們不是一時使用的,我之前有提過嗎?那些塑膠袋,即使它們是塑膠袋,它們都可以重用。我真的驚訝了。不可能!你真的可以做到嗎?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.230_ 到頭來我們其實好像不是很有禮貌的乘客 Angel explains what it means to be a good.json

chunks.chunk_text: 不可以!我不會再觸碰它們了,我的天啊。你自己帶吧,如果是可以。你看,現在很多飛行員,他們想要變得更加帥氣,所以他們把他們的塑膠袋裝上了塑膠袋,但它們還是塑膠袋。我知道,它們還是塑膠袋。但是如果它們不是一時使用的東西,那對不起。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.230_ 到頭來我們其實好像不是很有禮貌的乘客 Angel explains what it means to be a good.json

chunks.chunk_text: 所以我會自己帶我的塑膠袋,如果我能夠。下次我會買在飛行員的塑膠袋。在飛行員的購物。在飛行員的購物。買自己的塑膠袋。對,為了你的健康。然後我們通常會做的就是,有時候你們走過,我會把手放上。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.230_ 到頭來我們其實好像不是很有禮貌的乘客 Angel explains what it means to be a good.json

chunks.chunk_text: 按照這篇文章的說法,你必須按下按鈕。現在,作為一位飛行員,我看到你走過,我會把手放上。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.230_ 到頭來我們其實好像不是很有禮貌的乘客 Angel explains what it means to be a good.json

chunks.chunk_text: 如果她在飛行員的飛行員上,我會把她的手放上。因為她走到高樓上,找了一些東西,我還不知道她是否記得我的指令。可能是因為。可能是因為她忘了那些飛行員,因為你們都看起來相似。對不起,我不像金城武,我不像塔吉西。如果金城武在飛行艙上,我會記得。那就好。如果是安迪·勞爾,任何的星星,你們都是會記得。對,我們不需要記憶。你們女人們,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.230_ 到頭來我們其實好像不是很有禮貌的乘客 Angel explains what it means to be a good.json

chunks.chunk_text: 但除了那些可愛的男生或女生,所有人都跟我一樣,所以我真的不知道誰點了Coke Zero,我忘了,我的天啊。通常我會把Coke Zero拿出來,然後不停搖搖我的手,然後尋找其他人跟我說你好,你好,你好,然後後來沒有人會等我,然後我會自己把Coke Zero喝掉。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.230_ 到頭來我們其實好像不是很有禮貌的乘客 Angel explains what it means to be a good.json

chunks.chunk_text: 哇,所以這是一個很好的建議,如果下一次你想要Coke,你想要喝飲料的話,你可以把它寫下來給嘉賓團隊。我應該寫一張筆記,像是一張寫字的筆記。對,非常好,就是寫字的筆記,因為這就是我們做的,我們也寫在筆記上。所以這是一個很好的建議,現在是一個很好的建議。既然你們都很短暫的工作,就寫下自己的筆記,然後寫下你的座位號碼,畫一張心,然後說...畫一張心,然後你寫在大廳上。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.230_ 到頭來我們其實好像不是很有禮貌的乘客 Angel explains what it means to be a good.json

chunks.chunk_text: 然後說謝謝你給我的飲料,我正在尋找一個飲料,謝謝。謝謝,哇,這很友善,這很友善。對,很友善。很友善,對,很友善。不要互相互相互相擋住嘉賓團隊,對嗎?對,請不要。所以這篇文章提到的下一個東西是...
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.230_ 到頭來我們其實好像不是很有禮貌的乘客 Angel explains what it means to be a good.json

RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.230_ 到頭來我們其實好像不是很有禮貌的乘客 Angel explains what it means to be a good.json

chunks.chunk_text: 你太可怕了。你的兒子有飛機危險,那是一個生病的球。你的兒子是一個生病的球。請給我自己的醫生。好,哇,這很不常見,但如果你想想你飛多少個飛行員,如果是一千人,那基本上是每三個飛行員,對嗎?對。三個飛行員到四個飛行員,你會得到。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.230_ 到頭來我們其實好像不是很有禮貌的乘客 Angel explains what it means to be a good.json

chunks.chunk_text: 你會得到。你會得到。你會得到。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.230_ 到頭來我們其實好像不是很有禮貌的乘客 Angel explains what it means to be a good.json

chunks.chunk_text: 你會得到。你會得到。你會得到。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.230_ 到頭來我們其實好像不是很有禮貌的乘客 Angel explains what it means to be a good.json

chunks.chunk_text: 你會得到。你會得到。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.230_ 到頭來我們其實好像不是很有禮貌的乘客 Angel explains what it means to be a good.json

chunks.chunk_text: 你會得到。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.230_ 到頭來我們其實好像不是很有禮貌的乘客 Angel explains what it means to be a good.json

chunks.chunk_text: 你會得到。你有道理對,你該如何解決這個問題。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.230_ 到頭來我們其實好像不是很有禮貌的乘客 Angel explains what it means to be a good.json

chunks.chunk_text: 關於孩子們,我們應該,你知道嗎?如果孩子們在飛行中跑來跑去是很危險的所以我們有每個權利去教導孩子們,對嗎?我認為你是警察,我認為你們是警察,所以我會喜歡讓黃色褲襯衫女士來做一件事我會,我會,我會
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.230_ 到頭來我們其實好像不是很有禮貌的乘客 Angel explains what it means to be a good.json

chunks.chunk_text: 真正的警察,在我的生命中,我希望我會這麼可愛的樣子,和這麼懶惰的樣子,我會走進商業課堂上,拍我的臉,你不覺得懶惰嗎?我還是要讓她回家,把孩子送回家,然後,嗯,我認為關於這件事,我們只需要和父母有良好的溝通,因為他們不喝醉,嗯,嗯,然後,對,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.230_ 到頭來我們其實好像不是很有禮貌的乘客 Angel explains what it means to be a good.json
